verses.verse: Behold <S%H2005><s%>, the LORD'S <S%H3068><s%> hand <S%H3027><s%> is not shortened <S%H7114><s%>, that it cannot save <S%H3467><s%>; neither his ear <S%H241><s%> heavy <S%H3513><s%>, that it cannot hear <S%H8085><s%>:

But your iniquities <S%H5771><s%> have separated <S%H914><s%> between <S%H996><s%> you and your God <S%H430><s%>, and your sins <S%H2403><s%> have hid <S%H5641><s%> his face <S%H6440><s%> from you, that he will not hear <S%H8085><s%>. have hid: or, have made him hide

For your hands <S%H3709><s%> are defiled <S%H1351><s%> with blood <S%H1818><s%>, and your fingers <S%H676><s%> with iniquity <S%H5771><s%>; your lips <S%H8193><s%> have spoken <S%H1696><s%> lies <S%H8267><s%>, your tongue <S%H3956><s%> hath muttered <S%H1897><s%> perverseness <S%H5766><s%>.

None calleth <S%H7121><s%> for justice <S%H6664><s%>, nor any pleadeth <S%H8199><s%> for truth <S%H530><s%>: they trust <S%H982><s%> in vanity <S%H8414><s%>, and speak <S%H1696><s%> lies <S%H7723><s%>; they conceive <S%H2029><s%> mischief <S%H5999><s%>, and bring forth <S%H3205><s%> iniquity <S%H205><s%>.

They hatch <S%H1234><s%> cockatrice' <S%H6848><s%> eggs <S%H1000><s%>, and weave <S%H707><s%> the spider's <S%H5908><s%> web <S%H6980><s%>: he that eateth <S%H398><s%> of their eggs <S%H1000><s%> dieth <S%H4191><s%>, and that which is crushed <S%H2116><s%> breaketh out <S%H1234><s%> into a viper <S%H660><s%>. cockatrice': or, adder's crushed: or, sprinkled is as if there brake out a viper

Their webs <S%H6980><s%> shall not become garments <S%H899><s%>, neither shall they cover <S%H3680><s%> themselves with their works <S%H4639><s%>: their works <S%H4639><s%> are works <S%H4639><s%> of iniquity <S%H205><s%>, and the act <S%H6467><s%> of violence <S%H2555><s%> is in their hands <S%H3709><s%>.

Their feet <S%H7272><s%> run <S%H7323><s%> to evil <S%H7451><s%>, and they make haste <S%H4116><s%> to shed <S%H8210><s%> innocent <S%H5355><s%> blood <S%H1818><s%>: their thoughts <S%H4284><s%> are thoughts <S%H4284><s%> of iniquity <S%H205><s%>; wasting <S%H7701><s%> and destruction <S%H7667><s%> are in their paths <S%H4546><s%>. destruction: Heb. breaking

The way <S%H1870><s%> of peace <S%H7965><s%> they know <S%H3045><s%> not; and there is no judgment <S%H4941><s%> in their goings <S%H4570><s%>: they have made them crooked <S%H6140><s%> paths <S%H5410><s%>: whosoever goeth <S%H1869><s%> therein shall not know <S%H3045><s%> peace <S%H7965><s%>. judgment: or, right

Therefore is judgment <S%H4941><s%> far <S%H7368><s%> from us, neither doth justice <S%H6666><s%> overtake <S%H5381><s%> us: we wait <S%H6960><s%> for light <S%H216><s%>, but behold obscurity <S%H2822><s%>; for brightness <S%H5054><s%>, but we walk <S%H1980><s%> in darkness <S%H653><s%>.

We grope <S%H1659><s%> for the wall <S%H7023><s%> like the blind <S%H5787><s%>, and we grope <S%H1659><s%> as if we had no eyes <S%H5869><s%>: we stumble <S%H3782><s%> at noonday <S%H6672><s%> as in the night <S%H5399><s%>; we are in desolate <S%H820><s%> places as dead <S%H4191><s%> men.

We roar <S%H1993><s%> all like bears <S%H1677><s%>, and mourn <S%H1897><s%> sore <S%H1897><s%> like doves <S%H3123><s%>: we look <S%H6960><s%> for judgment <S%H4941><s%>, but there is none; for salvation <S%H3444><s%>, but it is far off <S%H7368><s%> from us.

For our transgressions <S%H6588><s%> are multiplied <S%H7231><s%> before thee, and our sins <S%H2403><s%> testify <S%H6030><s%> against us: for our transgressions <S%H6588><s%> are with us; and as for our iniquities <S%H5771><s%>, we know <S%H3045><s%> them;

In transgressing <S%H6586><s%> and lying <S%H3584><s%> against the LORD <S%H3068><s%>, and departing away <S%H5253><s%> from <S%H310><s%> our God <S%H430><s%>, speaking <S%H1696><s%> oppression <S%H6233><s%> and revolt <S%H5627><s%>, conceiving <S%H2029><s%> and uttering <S%H1897><s%> from the heart <S%H3820><s%> words <S%H1697><s%> of falsehood <S%H8267><s%>.

And judgment <S%H4941><s%> is turned away <S%H5253><s%> backward <S%H268><s%>, and justice <S%H6666><s%> standeth <S%H5975><s%> afar off <S%H7350><s%>: for truth <S%H571><s%> is fallen <S%H3782><s%> in the street <S%H7339><s%>, and equity <S%H5229><s%> cannot <S%H3201><s%> enter <S%H935><s%>.

Yea, truth <S%H571><s%> faileth <S%H5737><s%>; and he that departeth <S%H5493><s%> from evil <S%H7451><s%> maketh himself a prey <S%H7997><s%>: and the LORD <S%H3068><s%> saw <S%H7200><s%> it, and it displeased <S%H3415><s%> <S%H5869><s%> him that there was no judgment <S%H4941><s%>. maketh: or, is accounted mad it displeased: Heb. it was evil in his eyes

And he saw <S%H7200><s%> that there was no man <S%H376><s%>, and wondered <S%H8074><s%> that there was no intercessor <S%H6293><s%>: therefore his arm <S%H2220><s%> brought salvation <S%H3467><s%> unto him; and his righteousness <S%H6666><s%>, it sustained <S%H5564><s%> him.

For he put on <S%H3847><s%> righteousness <S%H6666><s%> as a breastplate <S%H8302><s%>, and an helmet <S%H3553><s%> of salvation <S%H3444><s%> upon his head <S%H7218><s%>; and he put on <S%H3847><s%> the garments <S%H899><s%> of vengeance <S%H5359><s%> for clothing <S%H8516><s%>, and was clad <S%H5844><s%> with zeal <S%H7068><s%> as a cloke <S%H4598><s%>.

According to <S%H5921><s%> their deeds <S%H1578><s%>, accordingly he will repay <S%H7999><s%>, fury <S%H2534><s%> to his adversaries <S%H6862><s%>, recompence <S%H1576><s%> to his enemies <S%H341><s%>; to the islands <S%H339><s%> he will repay <S%H7999><s%> recompence <S%H1576><s%>. deeds: Heb. recompences

So shall they fear <S%H3372><s%> the name <S%H8034><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> from the west <S%H4628><s%>, and his glory <S%H3519><s%> from the rising <S%H4217><s%> of the sun <S%H8121><s%>. When the enemy <S%H6862><s%> shall come in <S%H935><s%> like a flood <S%H5104><s%>, the Spirit <S%H7307><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> shall lift up a standard <S%H5127><s%> against him. lift: or, put him to flight

And the Redeemer <S%H1350><s%> shall come <S%H935><s%> to Zion <S%H6726><s%>, and unto them that turn <S%H7725><s%> from transgression <S%H6588><s%> in Jacob <S%H3290><s%>, saith <S%H5002><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%>.

As for me, this is my covenant <S%H1285><s%> with them, saith <S%H559><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%>; My spirit <S%H7307><s%> that is upon thee, and my words <S%H1697><s%> which I have put <S%H7760><s%> in thy mouth <S%H6310><s%>, shall not depart <S%H4185><s%> out of thy mouth <S%H6310><s%>, nor out of the mouth <S%H6310><s%> of thy seed <S%H2233><s%>, nor out of the mouth <S%H6310><s%> of thy seed's <S%H2233><s%> seed <S%H2233><s%>, saith <S%H559><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%>, from henceforth and for <S%H5704><s%> ever <S%H5769><s%>.
